reading--sample-taken: {0} sample taken within an area of {1} block(s)
config--description--reading-direction-a: If enabled, allows players to enable reading direction output in their client configs
config--description--map-marking-allowed: If enabled, allows players to enable automatic map marker creation in their client configs
config--description--reading-direction: If enabled and allowed by the server, adds the direction of the reading to the output, in addition to distance / quantity
config--description--map-marking: If enabled and allowed by the server, automatically creates a map marker for long-range distance and quantity samples
config--description--simplified: If enabled, only requires 1 sample to output the density readings. Will still consume the equivalent of 3 samples of durability
config--description--durability-cost: The amount of durability damage to take for each sample
config--description--sample-size-cube: The size of the sampled area. This area is a cube, centered on the sampled block
config--description--sample-size-cuboid: The size of the sampled area. This area is a cuboid, centered on the sampled block and stretching from the mantle to the world height
config--description--ordering-enabled: If enabled, the readings are ordered by the distance / quantity
config--description--ordering-direction: If ascending, the readings are ordered in increasing distance / quantity order
